intro: Hedera helix var. aurea, commonly known as the Golden Sword ivy, is a variegated cultivar of the common ivy. It features striking yellow and green variegation on its heart-shaped leaves, which enhances its ornamental value. This plant is a climbing evergreen vine that thrives in shaded to partially shaded environments. It has finely lobed leaves and produces small, inconspicuous greenish-white flowers followed by dark blue berries. Hedera helix var. aurea is popular in horticulture for its aesthetic appeal and adaptability to various growing conditions.
